title: Process Patient Name Change
description: A patient has legally changed their name and provides documentation. An HIM specialist needs to update their medical record.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct patient chart.

tasks.description: Verify the legal name change document (e.g., marriage certificate, court order).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the documentation is valid.

tasks.description: Update the patient's name in the demographic record while retaining their previous name as an alias.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the patient's name, ensuring continuity of care.
